author: kyungminparkdrums
body:
#### PR description:

This PR updates some ECAL DQM histograms in x-binning: Trigger Primitives Et distributions from GeV to ADC.

#### PR validation:

PR is validated by running the ECAL online DQM configuration and verifying the plots on a test DQM GUI.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This is the backport to `15_0_X`, which is currently in production for DQM. Master PR is made in #48354.
title: [15_0_X] Update in ECAL DQM some ECAL TP Et monitoring plot displays from GeV to ADC
